alert.note: Alert for Iroquois (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:39PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Iroquois County through 330 PM CDT... At 237 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms from Ashkum to near Donovan moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Watseka, Sheldon, Ashkum, Crescent City, Danforth, Woodland and Iroquois. Including the following interstate... I-57 between mile markers 287 and 293. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
